summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 包含控制和提供 Proxy 功能的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that control and provide functionality for proxies.

summary.span: Proxy 是做為遠端物件影像的本機物件。

span.span: A proxy is a local object that is an image of a remote object.

summary.span: Proxy 使用戶端能夠跨越遠端界限存取物件。

span.span: Proxies enable clients to access objects across remoting boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中一個最重要類別的命名空間是類別，這樣會提供基底功能的所有遠端 proxy，並可以用來建立自訂的 proxy。One of the most important classes of the namespace is the class, which provides the base functionality for all remoting proxies, and can be used to create custom proxies.
